entry.title: build: lefthook: add lefthook instead of husky for githook
entry.summary:
build: lefthook: add lefthook instead of husky for githook --
- lefthook.yml: lefthook config - gitignore:s ignore cache - textlintrc.yaml: remove preset-japanese

entry.title: docs: 2025-01-31: add commitlint for TIL repo
entry.summary: docs: 2025-01-31: add commitlint for TIL repo
entry.content:
.markdownlint.yaml
# lint rules line_length: 120 ------ docs/2025/2025-01.md
### 2025年1月31日
- ["TIL"](https://github.com/atsushifx/til)に commitlint を追加
- ["Zenn-dev"](https://github.com/atsushifx/zenn-dev/)に commitlint を追加

entry.title: build: update system configuration
entry.summary:
build: update system configuration
- install commitlint - config commitlint with .commitlintrc.ts - add husky to run commitlint on commit - husky : update ci-lint.sh use markdownlint-cli2 - textlint : update prh dictionary - delete icsmedia dictionary - add smarthr dictionary - editorconfig: update indent_size - textlint: update configuration to yaml - textlint: update prh dictionary\ - clear lint error from markdown
